mapper.insert: insert into sc_community (id, name, comment, address, telephone, pic_url, longitude, latitude, create_time, creator_id, modify_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{longitude,jdbcType=REAL}, #{latitude,jdbcType=REAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update sc_community set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pic_url = #{picUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=REAL}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=REAL}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, comment, address, telephone, pic_url, longitude, latitude, create_time, creator_id, modify_time from sc_community where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, name, comment, address, telephone, pic_url, longitude, latitude, create_time, creator_id, modify_time from sc_community
